title: The Exiled Daughter of Marquis is Dead - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Brainwashing   Broken Engagement   Cheats   Curses   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Heroes   Near-Death Experience   Nobles   Oneshot   Otome Game   Pregnancy   R-15   Revenge   Royalty   Saints   Transported into a Game World   Transported to Another World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Homura   ほむら
description:
Three years ago, the Crown Prince’s fiancée and daughter of the Marquis, was convicted and banished for attempting to murder the Saintess during the graduation party at the Royal Academy in the Kingdom of Lumitis.

The story begins when a hero from a nearby country requests an audience with the Crown Prince, who is married to the Saintess.>
